Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: The people of Australia have a lot to worry about as several news stories detail. Interest rates have been raised again migrants are losing their jobs due to visa issues and more than 920000 people are receiving Jobseeker payments. Fortunately help may be on the way as the federal government announces plans to provide cost of living relief -- focusing on childcare assistance and increasing social security payments-- which will benefit 1.2 million families.
